subtitles.transcript: Compared to where California used to be, things look bad. Where California used to be is
everybody had opportunities to go to UC for very low cost, and there was grant and scholarship aid
then, too, for lower-income students. So from that perspective, compared to what people think of as the promise
of the Master Plan for Higher Education in California, we look pretty bad.
Compared to other states, and once you take into account grant and scholarship aid, we still look pretty good.
